text: Pumahuaín (possibly from Quechua puma cougar, puma, Ancash Quechua wayi house,Leonel Alexander Menacho López, Yachakuqkunapa Shimi Qullqa, Anqash Qhichwa Shimichaw (Ministerio de Educación), Wordbook Ancash Quechua-Spanish "cougar house", -n a suffix) is a mountain in the southern part of the Cordillera Blanca in the Andes of Peru. It is situated in the Ancash Region, Recuay Province, Catac District. Puma Wayin lies southwest of Mururahu and Kunkush and northwest of Pukarahu.escale.minedu.gob.pe - UGEL map of the Recuay Province (Ancash Region) == Sources == Category:Mountains of Peru Category:Mountains of Ancash Region
title: Pumahuaín (Recuay)
